Posted By: .Blaze. (4/26/2012 3:52:03 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Paleopaladin: There's still mass -X/-X effects. My zombie deck, for example, could sac its army (including a [Noxious Ghoul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Noxious Ghoul)) and bring it back with [Balthor the Defiled](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Balthor the Defiled) to give all your creatures -8/-8 or more, killing Avacyn, Sigarda, Melira, Platinum, and Pristine. Late-game, Mutilate works too.  
  
Plus [Upheaval](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Upheaval), [Evacuation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evacuation), [Inundate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inundate), and [Wash Out](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wash Out) (White) still screw up your plans. Especially with a Warped Devotion in play.  
  
Also, [Hallowed Burial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hallowed Burial) and [Final Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Final Judgment).
posts.html:
Paleopaladin: There's still mass -X/-X effects. My zombie deck, for example, could sac its army (including a Noxious Ghoul) and bring it back with Balthor the Defiled to give all your creatures -8/-8 or more, killing Avacyn, Sigarda, Melira, Platinum, and Pristine. Late-game, Mutilate works too.

Plus Upheaval, Evacuation, Inundate, and Wash Out (White) still screw up your plans. Especially with a Warped Devotion in play.

Also, Hallowed Burial and Final Judgment.

Probably the card I'm most excited about.   
Theres only a few ways to kill her (-X/-X counters or forcing her to be sacrificed)

Get Sigarda, Host of Herons (if you run w/g) and thats that...  
Then all thats left is the Worldslayer...

posts.post_content:
A fantastic creature with an amazing ability. She will join [Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite) as a new bomb in white token decks. Be sure to use [Honor of the Pure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Honor of the Pure) and [Adaptive Automaton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Adaptive Automaton) when applicable for power boosts!  
  
And for people saying she is too expensive to cast, just use [Birthing Pod](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birthing Pod).
posts.html:
A fantastic creature with an amazing ability. She will join Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite as a new bomb in white token decks. Be sure to use Honor of the Pure and Adaptive Automaton when applicable for power boosts!

And for people saying she is too expensive to cast, just use Birthing Pod.

posts.post_content:
"I wish I had an angel for one moment of love I wish I had your angel tonight  
Deep into a dying day I took a step outside an innocent heart  
Prepare to hate me fall when I may. This night will hurt you likenever before  
Old loves they die hard, Old lies they die harder  
I wish I had an angel, For one moment of love I wish I had your angel   
Your Virgin Mary undone--  
I'm in love with my lust, Burning angel wings to dust I wish I had your angel tonight"  
--[Sorin, Lord of Innistrad](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sorin, Lord of Innistrad), Nightwish Planeswalker  
  
"Hope- the Avacyn giveth it and the Avacyn taketh it away! Praise Avacyn!"  
-[Stoneforge Mystic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stoneforge Mystic), presenting [Worldslayer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worldslayer) to Holy Avacyn
